short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Simple New Tab (browser's home page) inspired by Mac OS design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
macOS Inspired New Tab

Elevate your browsing experience with macOS Inspired New Tab, a sleek, beautifully designed extension that transforms your default new tab page into a stylish and functional space. Taking cues from macOS aesthetics, this extension brings a touch of elegance to your browser.

Features You’ll Love:
Elegant Widgets: Display an analog clock, date, month, day inspired by macOS design and personalized greetings .
Powerful Search: Search effortlessly with an input bar that allows you to choose from Browser default search engine or Youtube
Quick Access: View your top-visited sites for seamless navigation, with customizable options to open links in the same tab or a new one.
macOS-Style Settings Panel: A familiar design that lets you fine-tune your experience with ease.
Hide or show greetings, top-visited sites, and search engine options.
Toggle between dark, light, and system themes.
Choose wallpaper from list of wallpaper.
Upload and set your favourite wallpaper for a personal touch.
Toggle calendar between month view and date view.
Supports Voice Search with Siri like voice button
Launchpad: View and access commonly used links in a separate overlay
Supports these languages: English, Kannada, Portuguese, Chinese, Russian, Vietnamese, Hindi, Turkish, Spanish, Korean, Italian, French, Czech, Bengali, Japanese, Uzbek, Marathi, Indonesian

Why Choose macOS Inspired New Tab?
This extension combines functionality and style, offering customisation options that make your browser's home page truly yours. Whether you’re looking for a clean, minimalist look or a fully personalised dashboard, macOS Inspired New Tab provides the tools to create an experience that suits your needs.

Bring the sophistication of macOS design to your browser today!
